org.apache.archiva.redback.rbac.cached

Class CachedRbacManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.redback.rbac.cached.CachedRbacManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RBACManager, RBACManagerListener

    @Service(value="rbacManager#cached")
public class CachedRbacManager
extends Object
implements RBACManager, RBACManagerListener
    CachedRbacManager is a wrapped RBACManager with caching.
    Author:
    Joakim Erdfelt
